O jogo tem gráficos impecáveis (levando em consideração que é um jogo antigo), funciona em qualquer maquina. E seu modo cooperativo é muito divertido, recomendo pra joga-lo com seus amigos. A unica critica que tenho ao jogo são os mapas da comunidade, é muito difícil encontrar algum mapa que seja possível termina-lo. Mas em geral o jogo é muito bom, recomendo à todos.

Хорошая игра. Буду краток игра хорошая, как поиграть в одиночку там где интересные персонажи и иногда смешные шутеечки. Так и для игры с другом, там где можно застрять на уровне на пол часа. Еще бывают смешные моменты :D Но главное уровни не повторяются а добавляют что то новое. В кооп например нужна командная работа на уровнях (и мозги конечно). В одиночке просто надо шевелить мозгами. Крч если вы думаете покупать или нет то. Если вы хотите просто пройти и забить то дождитесь скидки потому что для такой цели дорого, ну а если с другом поугарать порешать головоломки то покупайте игра с другом всегда веселей!

Portal 2 is one of the greatest game that I have ever played. The story is even better than the first one and the worldbuilding is incredible. Would recommend to experienced gamers and new players alike. 10/10

Portal 2 стал для меня игрой, которую я никогда не искал, но очень в ней нуждался. Мне действительно, была интересно проходить все испытания и тесты. Ох! А как же я ликовал, когда на испытания, которые у меня не получались часами, я наконец находил ответ!
Из новых механик в этой игре появились различные гели с отличными друг от друга свойствами. И лучше вам запомнить их сразу же, иначе вы обязательно переломаете себе все ноги! Остались незабытыми также турели, которые обязательно подожгут ваш пукан, если вы будете крайне невнимательными. И в добавок появились специальные установки для прыжков на дальние расстояния.
Изюминкой же игры стал лучший пельмешек с голубым глазом-окуляром - Уитли. Он, действительно, разнообразил прохождение уровней и едкие фразочки ГЛэДОС, об истории которой мы сможем узнать ближе к концу игры. Мне было безумно интересно следить за сюжетом, поэтому мне хотелось как можно быстрее проходить тесты. Надеюсь, после прохождения вы будете испытывать те же положительные эмоции, как и я!

В целом, я старательно рекомендую данную игру и жду возможности поиграть в кооп с друзьями. Тем, кто прочитал этот отзыв - всего хорошего!

Пишу положительный обзор чтобы хоть что-то положительное было МУЖСКОГО рода!

Эта игра крайне возмутительная для всех МУЖЧИНЫ! Призываю всех неравнодушных владельцев ДОСТОИНСТВА бороться против ФЕМИНИЗМА за РАВНОПРАВИЕ ПОЛОВ! В игре все ЖЕНСКИЕ персонажи представлены положительными геройшами, в то время как МУЖСКИЕ - плохими!

Главная героиня Челл ЖЕНСКОГО пола, она обладает смекалкой и проворством, и несмотря на голодную диету сумела сохранить хорошу физическую форму. Также вопреки заранее заполненному МУЖЧИНАМИ бланку про неё с клеймом "ужасный человек" она проявляла себя только с лучшей стороны. Именно этих МУЖЧИН навешивающих ярлыки можно наблюдать за стёклами испытательных комплексов в 1й части.

Самый большой РАЗДОЛБАЙ Уитли представлен МУЖСКИМ полом. Он также был назван "маленьким глупышом", и он НЕНАВИДИТ ЛЮДЕЙ.
Напротив ЖЕНЩИНА ГЛэДОС изображена ценной научной сотрудницей, полностью отдающая себя науке.

Все НЕИСПРАВНЫЕ и изуродованные турели имеют МУЖСКОЙ голос. Их умоляющих дать второй шанс отправляют по конвееру в утиль! А еще есть плакаты призывающие заменять работников МУЖСКОГО пола на роботов.
Напротив все работающие турели, как поющие так и стреляющие - имеют ЖЕНСКИЙ облик. Также стоит отметить право женского самоопределения, когда игра предоставляет возможность помочь миролюбивой турели ЖЕНСКОГО пола.

Самый главный ЗЛОДЕЙ Кейв Джонсон также МУЖСКОГО пола! Он постоянно врёт, и обещая испытуемым по $60 отправляет обездоленных людей на верную смерть самыми изощрёнными путями, а до 1970 года было принято свыше 450 испытуемых! Также он нарушил закон федерации о трудоустройстве инвалидов. Еще он УКРАЛ у Чёрной Мезы корабль и присвоил все заслуги исследования порталов себе. В одной из записей он предложил с помощью ракетного двигателя снизить количество воды в МУЖСКОМ организме с 60% до 30%!

СМЕРТЕЛЬНЫЙ нейротоксин имеет МУЖСКОЙ род!
Напротив ПОЛЕЗНАЯ штука кубша-компаньйонша имеет розовый окрас и изображение сердца, что также указывает на ей ЖЕНСКИЙ пол!

Долой матриархат! ФЕМИНИСТКИ выходите из чата! Да здравствует ГЕНДЕРНОЕ РАВНОПРАВИЕ!

Оценка 10 феминисток из 10

portal, portal, portal... como te quiero Portal...

Aquí tenemos la segunda entrega del juego subtramado de Half-Life, Portal 2.
Nos volvemos a poner en la piel de Chell, nuestra sujeto de pruebas fav, con una historia rejuvenecida:

En esta secuela de Portal despertamos mes y medio después de haber sido criogenizada tras la caida de GLaDOS, parece que el robot al mando es "Wheatley", un robot con tanto carisma como aires de grandeza...

En un principio y por cosas del destino nos volvemos a topar con GLaDOS dentro de las oficinas de Aperture Science, Wheatley será nuestro estúpido compinche que nos ayude a destruirla una vez más, aunque.... es esta secuela ciertos giros de guión dejan ver que ni los buenos son tan buenos, ni.. los malos tan... malos?

Dejando la historia a parte, que no os la quiero destripar en este Portal tenemos un lavado de cara general... Llama la atención el salto a nivel gráfico ya que contamos con un motor Source mucho más desarrollado y mimado manteniendo una exquisita optimización (en mi caso 200-250 fps en Ultra).

Damos la bienvenida a nuevas mecánicas como los geles, una serie de líquidos con propiedades especiales, dar velocidad, salto, habilitar paredes para el uso de portales...

Recalcar la introducción de una "workshop" con la que la gente puede crear pruebas para la sección "Cámaras de la comunidad", lo que da todavía más horas y si esto te sigue pareciendo poco, también tienes un modo cooperativo muy entretenido para echar unas horas de risa con algún colega.

En definitiva, portal 2, una nueva remesa de pruebas, plataformas y puzzles que te tendrán bastantes horas intentando discernir la forma de pasar a la siguiente fase con algún toque de humor y de nostalgia respecto al original.

-RECOMENDADO.

如果你是因为犹豫要不要买游戏而来看的评论区，那我告诉你，直接去买v社大包，你不会后悔的。
=============================================================
当初在b站看完了半条命的纪录片还有达奇做的半条命介绍后，就迫不及待的去玩了半条命1和2，两款游戏让我对v社佩服的五体投地，即使是在2020年玩到，也依然能感受到无比的震撼，真不愧为推动游戏发展的神作。
而后，我开始查阅大量资料来了解v社，不可避免的成为了v社的死忠粉。
v社可以说是只在乎游戏的创新，如果不能创新，那么v社宁肯不做游戏，这也是为什么v社许多游戏都在2代戛然而止，用g胖的话就是，我不想随意去压榨ip的价值，这是v社与其他游戏公司的根本不同，由于没有上市，v社根本不需要在乎什么财报，他们只需要在乎游戏创新与否，好玩与否，他们不会像某些公司，胡乱的出续作，结果是好的游戏烂尾，好的故事终结。
传送门原本是两个大学生的创意，v社看到后便买了下来，这是v社的基本操作，v社一直都喜欢让富有创意的点子发扬光大，cs，求生之路，dota2都是如此。起源引擎又恰好能够很方便的呈现出传送门，于是很快，传送门一代就做了出来，和半条命同属一个世界观，游戏中的光圈科技公司和半条命的黑山基地是死对头，竞争对手，双方都在研究传送门的科技，而黑山基地得到了政府的信任，疯狂的光圈科技尽管更为先进，却不能让政府放心，一代的流程比较短，我只花了3个小时就通关了，但是游戏体验非常的棒，巧妙的关卡设计让玩家不断地有动力的进行下去，各种细节又不断暗示着玩家剧情并没有像表面上看起来那么的简单，表面上干净整洁的测试房间，却总是出现破败的管道房，神秘的涂鸦，偶尔失控的ai，这些都给游戏加上了层神秘感，最终，这些都得到了揭晓，就在黑山基地串联共振发生的时候，遥远的光圈科技底下试验设备中的暴走的人工智能GLaDOS已经杀死了光圈科技的人类员工，我们操作的主角雪儿最终打败了GLaDOS，暂时结束了这一切，涂鸦也在官方漫画中得到了揭晓，这是一位员工“鼠人”留下的，他一直在暗中帮助主角，而伙伴方块就是他最好的朋友，真的难以想象fps还可以这么玩，解密游戏还可以这么解密，值得一提的是半条命2利用起源实现了物理谜题，而传送门则实现了空间谜题，v社并没有尝试时间谜题，时间谜题最终让耻辱和泰坦陨落二完成了，泰坦陨落二也可以说是近十年来最棒的半条命式剧情了。
2011年，v社发售了传送门2，向世人展示了他们还是一个单机游戏公司，更加精妙的关卡设计，更加长的游戏流程，更加丰富的游戏剧情，可以说完全超越了一代，二代时间线并未得知，有人认为已经过了几万年，但是游戏中有一处能听到地面飞驰而过的联合军剃刀列车的声音，所以我个人更加倾向于此时联合军还在地球上，也就是只过了几十年，但是结局中的麦田又不好解释，只能说可能v社当时没考虑那么多。二代里，我们遇到了一个核心，惠特利（很奇怪一代boss战我不是把这几个核心都烧了吗），他告诉我们没有GLaDOS维护基地，与一代干净整洁的测试室相比，这里已经荒废许久，到处都是破败的景象，四处都长满了植物，荒凉感油然而生，最初几个关卡和一代是一模一样的，同样的关卡，只是场景已大不相同。在接管了GLaDOS后，惠特利叛变了，所以我们要和G姐并肩作战了233，在穿过了约翰逊在60年代就建立的地下测试网络，我们终于和成为了土豆的G姐从地下钻了出来，G姐也得知了，自己是约翰逊的爱人凯若琳的大脑电子化的产物，这让她的情感更加丰富。此时的光圈科技已经快被惠特利这个傻逼核心要搞废了，如果不赶紧让G姐替换掉惠特利，这里就要没了，紧接着又是跟一代差不多的熟悉的boss战，我还以为这样就结束了了呢，不过v社还是给了玩家一个惊喜，最终那个利用月球来破局的关卡设计真的惊人，想法大胆，那个在月球上的场景真的震撼人心，只能说，v社nb。
在那之后，十几年来，v社都一直在运营DOTA2和CSGO两个电竞项目，再也没了任何单机游戏的消息，半条命最终定格在了那个心碎的结局，传送门也没了后续，玩家们一年又一年的等待，G胖不会数3已经成了著名的梗，越来越多的人开始大肆宣扬v社已经丧失了制作3
A的能力，v社只是在等死等言论，直到，半条命艾利克斯的出现，狠狠的打了这些人的脸。
我只能说，这些人其实并不了解v社，于是他们开始怀疑v社对待游戏的态度，然而，在当初半条命2发售前夕，半条命2就惨遭泄露，v社一直对泄露此事耿耿于怀，不仅将原本半条命2的大部分设计全都在短时间内推翻重做，在那之后，也几乎对自己的动向守口如瓶，他们不愿意再出现泄露此事了。所以v社在外界看来几年都没有动静，事实上他们一直在忙着做事，只是不愿透露，现在我们知道了，v社在过去的几年里，一直在做起源2与VR。现在，他们终于做成了，目前已知v社在做三款VR游戏，一个是HLA，一个应该是众神之谷，另一个并不清楚是什么，不管是什么，总之，又到了V社推动游戏发展的时候了。
HLA是我现在唯一不得不云的v社游戏了，但是仅仅只是看视频，就足以感受到这款游戏是有多么的厉害，不得不感叹起源引擎对细节的渲染是那么的真实，v社在做游戏的能力上从未让玩家们失望。现在，半条命的剧情终于又开始继续了，尽管这只向后推动了几十秒，但这也足以让玩家们激动沸腾，只是，随着结局的改变，剧情也会随之改变，那么半条命还会和传送门的剧情衔接吗，戈登会登上北极光号吗，那个承载着人类最后希望的船只，那个满载着人类最顶尖科技的光圈科研船，还在北极静静地等待，无数半条命和传送门玩家都在等待着，撬棍的再次拿起，传送枪的再次启动，有时候在想，就算半条命随便出个结局，玩家们应该也不会太过责怪，这个游戏真的该有一个结局了，玩家们十几年的等待，还要再等多少年啊。
无数的反抗军付出了生命的代价，联合军却依旧无法撼动，戈登能否再次用撬棍尻爆一切，地球最后会怎样。我真的，真的太想要看到结局了，哪怕不是完美的结局，只要有就行了，我也太想看到传送门和半条命的剧情衔接了，我不知道v社还要花多长时间，如果v社能有别的厂商的体量就好了，我希望这不会让玩家等太长时间，不知有多少人，都把热情倾注于这两个ip之上了，对于玩家的角度而言，几年打磨来推动游戏发展意义非凡，但对于个人而言，我已经不在乎这么多了。
最后，喜欢传送门的玩家，可以去试试一代的mod序曲，这是粉丝制作的一代前传，还有二代的mod梅尔故事，属于外传，两个mod都是质量极高的mod，有配音，当然难度也不是一般的高，当然没玩过半条命的玩家也强烈建议去玩半条命，觉得一代太过时了可以去买粉丝制作的一代重置黑山起源，二代至今也没过时，可以直接玩的。
不知道该说什么了，以后想到什么再来补充吧，就先这样。

Just amazing. While portal may have felt a little unfinished and clunky at times, portal 2 fixes it all, at least for me it did. The game feels much more complete and organized, and everything seems to be in the game for a reason. Compared to portal 1, it has a much longer single player campaign with much more depth to it. New game mechanics, and also the co-op gamemode make portal feel new and exciting again. To top all of that, there are thousands of workshop maps made by other players to complete, and an active modding community with multiple large mods being made by the minute. If you liked portal, you'll most certainly enjoy portal 2.
GOOD

The sequel to the Biggest and Greatest Game of I-Spy in a generation.At least, that's what I felt like while playing this. Or, that this was that game of I Spy. I really felt like I was playing something revolutionary with Portal 1. Portal 2 feels almost like an expansion that continue the story, which is gripping and exciting, while tossing as many new mechanics and upgrades under the hood as possible. Basic fluid mechanics? Yeah, sure. No fluid weight or pressure games. But there is painting, with different fluids doing different things. There's also tractor / repulsor beams. And I suppose that when modding is taken into consideration, options go well through the roof of original portal.Now, what do we have to say for the game itself?It's more Portal. It took me awhile to sit down and commit to a full playthrough, which wasn't very long. And, honestly, wasn't very challenging. There were some stumpers in there, but only two or three. Maybe four, but I refuse to count the 'paint your own escape' puzzle as one. As most of the challenge was physically painting.The environments though, once you escape the test chambers, are pretty crazy. Also, there are a couple of opportunities to actually break out of the test chambers, in little spaces. Which I think is really cool. Maybe I found the only ones? I hope there are more.I don't know if I would have viewed the game so highly, if I had bought it for $60 on release day. But, on sale when I did buy it, for cheap, years later? You know, I think it was a lot of fun.Not a hardcore puzzle game by any means. But, that's what the workshop is for.

Portal 2 je dobrá hra, plná puzzlů, smrtících pastí atd.
Jedna z nejlepších věci je co-op, kde můžete hrát s kamarádem a řešit spolu různe Levely, Fakt zábava.
Singleplayers je taky dobrý, ale řekl bych že co-op je lepší protože tam můžete hrát s kamarádem.
Taky jsou tam level které někdo udělal, taky to je zábava, a navíc to můžete hrát s kamarádem.
Ale dneska ta hra je trošku mrtvá a když chcete hrát co-op s někym cizim, tak jak kdy tam na někoho narazíte a většinou je to někdo kdo se hned odpojí  nebo neumí spolupracovat.
Ale i tak to doporučuji protože je to dobrá hra, cena za to stojí.

Сколько сказано было про эту игру, сколько скажут ещё потом. Приятная графика, атмосфера всеобъемлющего пиздеца и легкое чувство вины после прохождения - это всё про второй портал. Сюжетом игру определенно не обделили, как и разными головоломками, которые здесь могут заставить пойти смотреть прохождение в интернете и потом сильно удивиться, что ответ на загадку лежал на [i]такой[/i] поверхности. Кстати, тут есть некоторые косяки с озвучкой, когда голоса внезапно пропадают, перемещаются и промахиваются по хронометражу, но поверьте моему слову, она тут самая шедевральная - лучше озвучки, чем здесь я ещё не видел. Не, ну не отрицаю конечно, что есть игры с озвучкой получше, но я таких не знаю. Новый ААА проект от польской компании (ребятам из будущего, которые не поймут, что это - я про киберпанк 2077) имеет озвучку уровня в разы хуже, чем здесь, стареньком втором портале.
Как-то так вот. Постпиздецовая атмосферка и шутки-минутки от неунывающих и неживых спутников, один из которых - босс этого заведения, а второй просто имеет некоторые обязанности. Как-то так.

Puzzles are fun, challenging. A perfect challenge; grinds the gears but you never get frustrated or rage.

Truly a blissful experience.

Esse jogo é perfeito, modo história impécavel, personagens comicos e caricatos, coop divertidissimo pra jogar com amigos. O único defeito é ser feito pela Valve, que infelizmente, não sabe contar até 3.
只能说完美，剧情，玩法，创意，长度，演出都无可挑剔，附带内容的漫画也补完了一二代之间的空白，还对应了一代的涂鸦和伙伴方块等彩蛋，还有super8也对应了游戏中的列车声，难以想象这是2011年的作品，甚至一代我都感觉是2015年之后的产物，我现在只想知道女主最后的结局，3我倒不太指望，哪怕半条命续作提一下战死或者寿终正寝也好啊

Na primeira vez que me falaram de Portal, eu não me interessei, até então eu nunca tinha gostado de puzzles, mas era tanto elogio que eu decidi dar uma chance pra Portal 2 no meu Xbox, demorei um pouco rpa me adaptar, mas se tornou muito instigante depois que eu aprendi a lógica do jogo, zerei no modo single, depois zerei o cooperativo com um amigo, zerei o primeiro Portal e acabei comprando aqui na Steam pra poder usufruir do conteúdo extra, acabei zerando novamente por aqui. 
A campanha single de Portal II é ótima, é dividida entre as câmaras de teste e alguns trechos de jogo entre as câmaras. As câmaras de teste são incríveis, muito desafiadoras, porém todas podem ser resolvidas com uma boa aplicação da lógica, mesmo que algumas exijam bastante nesse sentido, era isso que me irritava nos jogos de terror old school, tinha muitos puzzles sem lógica, no qual você tinha que adivinhar uma solução(leia-se, procurar a resolução em algum detonado), as câmaras de Portal não são assim, elas te dão pistas claras e pedem o seu raciocínio. Porém, existe um ou outro trecho irritante entre as câmaras, trechos onde eu fiquei sem saber pronde ir, é pouca coisa, essa seria a única queixa que eu faria desse jogo, de resto, só elogios.
O modo coop é ainda melhor que o single, tvz seja o melhor coop de sofá da histórias dos games, mas é difícil. 
Os gráficos do jogo são ótimos, considerando que é um jogo que roda até mesmo em monitores um único núcleo.
A curva de aprendizado tá 100% correta, o desafio vai aumentando degrau por degrau.
O humor sarcástico da Glados é muito bom, é um nome garantido na minha lista de melhores vilões da história dos games.
A Valve foi generosa no conteúdo extra e o preço do jogo é muito abaixo daquilo que ele realmente vale.
Não é um jogo pra todos, mas recomendo a todos que gostam de desafios lógicos, povo que gosta de sudoku, xadrez, tetris e coisas do tipo tende a adorar o jogo.

Portal 2 e um jogo da valve feita pelo aquele cara do começo do jogo que te olha e vc arrepia tudo, ele que me contou, mas modestias a parte portal meu amigo, os capricharam em um jogo não vou mentir, o jogo de puzzles de portais com uma história loca que vc fica meio, FUUUUUUUUUUU algumas vezes mas e claro que é um fuuuu bom, histórianha tranquilo e intrigante que vc fica pensando oque vai acontecer, com os glados e o menino robos, escrevinhado errado mesmo, que vc fica intrigado por uma história de um jogo de puzzle, uau, mas o ponto alto é os puzzles, cada sacada boa que os cara faz que as vezes vc fica preso, mas depois vc vê que é mais fácil do que vc pensa, mas vc precisa de um QI alto pra jogar mano, de verdade, alguns vc precisa prestar atenção pensando que é uma prova serião, vc se perde ou fica com raiva as vezes mas quando vc passa vc pensa "caramba só o einsten" mas qm é o einsten e os cara que fizeram, gráfico bom mano, bem tranquilo para a época que lançou e bem bonito comparado a alguns jogos, de verdade, nas cutscenes é muito bom, bem bonito e detalhado muleke, mais rendenrizado que um vídeo bem feito, a valve faz um jogos tops de mais mano, sem eles nem taria aqui NEM VC, n teria steam né mano, imagina, mas o ponto fraco são as telas de loading que podem quebrar sua imersão mas é porque o mapa tem uma continuidade muito boa, mesmo vc subindo infinitamente, uma coisa que não faz sentido mas se fosse pra baixo ai sim que n faria sentido, e também tem o modo coop bom demais, tem mapas da sociedade que são muito bons, e a sociedade também é ótima, mas mano compra aí, promo claro que fica 2 conto e 4 conto, e joga mano, PENSE BEM NESSE JOGO, TENHA UM QI ELEVADO, EU TE AVISEI :)

Amazing. It is absolutely worth it nearly a decade later. I loved playing it a ton. Portal 2 has quite complex puzzles which are very satisfying to solve. However what I did not expect is the game to have such an amazing storyline. It is full of great surprises. There are also tons of jokes and comical moments which fit the game very very well. It is great. The game characters have very strong personalities and it's a huge plus. After I completed the game, only then I realised what a masterpiece I was missing out on for the past 9 years. I will remember this game for years now. Now if you haven't played it yet, just do it. Highly recommended.

Also, before playing this, you should play the original Portal. There are lots of references to it in this game.

Had a chance to play the first Portal and that game was a surprising find. Coming to its sequel I had higher expectations and boy did it meet them. The graphics were greatly improved while keeping the originals art style. The performance was smooth, and the game progression was just as good. Gameplay is charming and brutal with some of the most complicated puzzles I have ever had the pleasure of dominating! The written is also top notch with great voice performances by everyone. Great game highly recommended, and the cake is indeed a lie.

И так, Portal 2-прямое продолжение Portal. 
[list]
    
[/list][*]Графика. Начну с Графики с первой части было обнаружен прорыв в данной части, игра смотрится очень живо. А частицы, как все физично и живо смотрится, словами не описать, как ты всему удивляешься.
[*]Головоломки. Тоже важный пункт, так как это основной геймплей. По началу головоломки детские, решаются настолько быстро, что даже скрипт с ГЛаДоС не успевает за тобой, ты летишь как орёл. Но когда начинается часть с нашим синим одноглазым "другом", то начинается разгон сложности головоломок. Если ты такой же инвалид по внимательности, как и я, то мои тебе соболезнования, времени ты просадишь достаточно.
[*]Сюжет и Юмор. Нам рассказывают, кто такая Гладос (aka. karoline), кто на самом деле такой Уитли. Рассказывают о учёном с которым работала karoline, мы можем найти его портрет, так же мы можем увидеть. Мы узнаем почему только на белых поверхностях мы можем ставить порталы и из чего их делают. Юмор. Смешно? да. Очень? да. Что-то ещё хочешь услышать? Иди покупай и играй. Шутки про приёмность, то что тебя бросили в детстве. И многое другое ты сможешь услышать, если ты умеешь слушать, если не умеешь, удаляй страничку.
[*]Кооператив. Есть ли он тут? Да, есть. Интересный ли он? Определённо. Весёлый ли он? Если у вас друг не баннихопер-спидраннер с IQ выше 1000, то да весёлый, а так вы по баннихоперу-спидраннеру с IQ выше 1000 даже лазером не попадёте.
[*]Тут можно создавать карты для друзей или просто для Workshop'a, я тоже создал одну. Вот если хочешь оценить, то покупай игру и проходи.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2352462171
[/list]

Portal 2 Is a worthy successor to the original game and heavily improves upon it. First off, the graphics have been greatly improved making the game timeless in terms of visuals. Moreover, the gameplay has also been expanded by giving the player a few more tools to solve puzzles like the bouncy gel or the speedy gel. These new tools are limited to certain puzzles, however. puzzles are much more complicated as well making the game twice as hard than the first one. In addition, the game comes with a co-op mode where one and their friend can solve puzzles outside of the main game. The story is also greater than the one in the first game being even funnier and interesting having a few more characters instead of just having Chell and Glados again making the plot more engaging while also having a few plot-twists here and there. The only drawback in this game for me personally, was the final hour of the game forcing you to do a few dull puzzles that you really I just didn't really care about and wanted to finish quickly in order to get to the final bossfight.

overall a great experience and a must-play for anyone who is looking for something different

В некой своей мере игра настолько сделана плохо в отрицательном значении этого слова что иногда кажется как тебя переполняют чувства непонимания к понятному изложению вещей, и если ты захочешь когда-нибудь поиграть в эту игру, то скорей всего возможно тебе понравится как она сделана в плане игры, не как продукт, а как искусство. Portal 2 is incredibly fun with an amazing atmosphere and interesting characters. I've yet to play the original Portal, but this is still great as a standalone game. With co-op and community test chambers as well, it provides lots of entertainment long after you finish single player mode. Absolutely buy this game if you are interested in it; it's so worth the price!

What's really to say about Portal 2 that hasn't already been said?  It's one of the best puzzle games I've played countless times when I owned it on PS3 and I am glad to finally have it on steam.  This game is funny, clever, and not too challenging that it's ever frustrating, but not too easy that you can just blow through it.  The cooperative mode is also great.  Portal 2 will always be in my top 10 video games ever.

Portal 2 is a puzzle game alright, the series seems to be praised as "the best" and a "must have" I can tell you I disagree with that not that I mean that it's bad but I just wouldn't say its for everyone and a "must have" for any player.

Pros:
Fun puzzles.
Good characters.
Good writing.
Fine graphics.

Cons:
Overstays its welcome sometimes.

The story is simple and basic:
[spoiler] after the first game your character has been stuck in a room for a long time I mean really long time, basically the end of the world long. You wake up and meet up with Wheatley, a clearly more lighthearted character meant for jokes. You go do what portal usually does until like everything goes to pissland with Wheatley turning out to be I guess you can say evil, now with control over the body of Glados, it's time to fight against him you go through the history of Aperture meet Potato Glados and team up to defeat Wheatley. After defeating Wheatley Glados let's you go.

So basically it's a classic robot turn evil story. [/spoiler]

If you like linear puzzle games and me saying it overstays its welcome sometimes doesn't scare you away I'd recommend it.

To say Portal 2 is amazing is an understatement. The story, the graphics and gameplay are just flawless, and really get you to think outside the box. They're combined in a way that creates a perfect balance. It challenges you with well-made puzzles, and is able to integrate a story that goes along just perfect with it. It doesn't focus on either factor TOO much, and in the end leaves you with a great experience. Portal 2 deserves all the praise it gets.

☯ ХОРОШАЯ ИГРА ☯ 
  Одна из лучших игр-головоломок (да и вообще игр) в принципе! Ещё с детства мне понравилась первая 
   часть серии, которая проходилась всего за час-полтора. Здесь же.. Здесь всё отполировано фактически 
   до ИДЕАЛА : графика, и по сей день радующая глаз (игре более 8 лет), интересный сюжет, 
   харизматичные и запоминающиеся герои, сбалансированные квесты, невероятно увлекательный 
   кооператив - всё это здесь, в Portal 2! В наши дни таких легендарных игр выходит достаточно мало, но 
   Valve просто заставили меня боготворить эту игру! Твёрдая 10!
   Элен Маклейн, озвучившая ГЛэДОС, Кэролайн, турели и спевшая все те песни, она просто на вес золота.
   Космос!Космос!!Космос? 
   КООООООООООССССССССМММММММММОООООООООССССССССССССС!!!

[h1] Portal 2 [/h1]

Portal wpisał się w historię video jako jedna z najbardziej innowacyjnych i odprężających gier logicznych, a 
druga jego część... Ulepsza absolutnie wszystko. Począwszy od długości, przez wyrzucenie irytujących wyzwań, a w zamian wstawianie najlepszego trybu kooperacji, jaki świat gier widział, zakończywszy na samych zagadkach, które po rozwiązaniu wprawią w ciche „Wow, genialne!”. Przytłaczające swym ogromem pomieszczenia Aperture, atakujące nasze słuchawki ambientowymi dźwiękami sprawiają, że grę przechodzi się z wywieszonym językiem, pragnąc tylko więcej i więcej (nawet jeśli czasem bywa nudnawo). A na dokładkę edytor komór testowych, który pozwala wydłużyć zabawę niemal w nieskończoność, a może nawet odkryć w nas zacięcie twórcze. Humor stoi na świetnym poziomie – nieraz uśmiechniemy się pod nosem na to, co wyczyniają świetnie zdubbingowani Wheatley i GlaDOS. Jedyną kwestią, która wyróżnia się z dopicowanej na błysk całości to tragicznie długie loadingi, które absolutnie nie powinny mieć miejsca – to jednak tylko łyżeczka goryczy w beczce słodyczy. Tytuł niemal doskonały, wręcz rewolucyjny, w który każdy powinien zagrać, a przynajmniej znać.

Ocena: 10/10

Five or so years ago, I heard about this game called Portal. I heard it was pretty popular, so I found out where I could play it, set up an account, and played it. I completed it within the day. So then of course the next logical step was to buy the sequel, Portal 2. I figured it would be like the first. Short, simple, and with little lore.

I was wrong in the best of ways

Portal 2 is one of the best games I've ever played. I love puzzle games, but this one surprised me with how in depth the story went. The characters are charming. Wheatley is the lovable idiot who (spoiler alert) becomes the incompetent and chaotic final boss. GLaDOS is a cold, heartless robot who (spoiler alert) just so happens to realize the best option is to let Chell go. The turrets even have personalities!

The gameplay is amazing. Even when you're in test chambers, whether in old or new Aperture, you're always seeing what should be just out of frame. You can see the facility crumbling while you test forever. The attention to detail is amazing

I could gush about this game for hours. But there's one main point I'd like to stress. The Portal franchise was the reason I purchased Steam. Without it, I may not have realized how expansive the gaming community was, and I am so grateful to be here.

9/10 would recommend.

僕はこのゲームをクリスマスであるこの日クリアしました。今世界中の一般的な男性がが大切なガールフレンドと手繋いでいますが僕の手にはポータルガンがありますした、ですが一切後ろ向きな気持ちはありません。本当ですよ？
あくまでクリアまでの体感ですが前作よりもボリュームは多めで広い空間を探索するようなマップもあります(一本道ですが)。ポータルがんを使ったギミックは前作に引き続きそれを活かす多くのギミックが追加されています。演出やストーリーもすごくなっていてついつい笑ってしまう皮肉や小ネタが散りばめられています。
難点はやはり酔いやすいことでしょうか、オートセーブがありある程度は保存されるので疲れてきたら別の用事をすることをお勧めします。
またマップが非常に暗く、見にくい部分もあります。あまりに暗い場所は進行に必要ないことが多いので比較的明るめな場所を探索することが好まれます。前作をやっていなくても楽しめますがストーリーは続いてるしセール時には120円くらいで売っているのでぜひ1作目から！！

A Game Made for Smart Butts, the game requires extreme problem solving, and has quick and snappy dialogue. At first its easy for any beginner who doesn't understand the concepts of the game, but the game wastes no time to challenge its players. The story is absolutely genius, giving us loads of character development, and plenty of plot twists. The Duo Mode is the extra bit that only adds to this game's Overall Fun. You'll have plenty of laughs with your friend as you accidentally destroy each others characters, and plenty of crying as you spend hours stumped on a level just to find out that the solution was staring you in the face. This game is gorgeous, funny, and smart, and it shows. If you're tried of the easy games you keep acing and you're looking for a challenge, try Portal 2. (Give Me Free Stuff Steam).

Si jugaste el primer portal y te gustó lo que viste, preparate porque esta secuela deja a su antecesor como una demo de 3 horas. Toma el concepto tan original de puzzles con portales y lo expande en todos los sentidos, tanto en el gameplay, en su historia, en su apartado gráfico; en fin lo profundiza. Se nota como el equipo de desarrollo de Valve le pone su toque en muchos puntos del juego. 
Si tuviese que dar las razones de porque debes comprarlo y jugarlo, puedo resumirlo en que el juego está estructurado en una forma de afrontar la trama que me recordó mucho a los half-life, con detalles en todo momento. Desde el lado jugable, sigue utilizando portales de entrada y de salida, pero mientras avanza el juego añade distintos tipos de implementos que juegan con la física del entorno para resolver los puzzles (fluidos de hipervelocidad, de repulsión, campos gravitacionales, etc). 
Por fuera del modo historia, existe el apartado de mapas hechos por la comunidad que son una locura, la oportunidad de jugar en co-op tanto la historia como el modo comunidad, modos de desafío, y niveles agregados como citas de audios con conceptos del equipo de desarrollo mientras estaban organizando el juego.
Es un juego que me dejó una gran sensación al terminarlo, al igual que el primero. Es corto pero vale mucho la pena, muy recomendado!

¿Que se puede decir de Portal 2 que no se haya dicho antes? Este juego fue un clásico instantáneo en cuanto salió allá por el 2011. Tomó lo que estaba bien del Portal original y no solo lo mejoró, sino que amplió mucho más la jugabilidad y la historia que se vio en el 2007. 

La mecánica de los portales ya estaba bien desarrollada y era por todos conocida, así que dieron una vuelta de tuerca a la jugabilidad añadiendo los distintos tipos de geles (hay tres en el juego, pero se descartó al menos uno durante el desarrollo que sigue pudiendo usarse con comandos), los haces de luces sólida, plataformas de salto, y seguro otras cosas que se me escapan de la memoria hacen la experiencia de juego mucho mas divertida y exigente que antes, ya que los rompecabezas no se limitan solo a saber colocar portales, sino que es necesario dominar todos los nuevos elementos para poder progresar. 

La historia fue ampliada para contarnos los orígenes no solo de Aperture Science y GLaDOS, sino también para darnos algunos indicios sobre el pasado de Chell. Lograron sacarnos de los inmaculados laboratorios futuristas de Aperture y nos lanzaron de cabeza a explorar las antiguas y deterioradas instalaciones de la empresa, lo cual se agradece, ya que los puzles en esas zonas no parecen tan lineales como podrían haber resultado algunos en el primer juego. Además se añaden algunos personajes, bastante carismáticos a su manera, que si bien no son muchos nos dan algunos de los momentos más divertidos que recuerdo en el mundo de los videojuegos. Muy recomendable jugar el juego con las voces originales, J. K. Simmons prestando su voz a Cave Johnson es tremendo y da muy bien con el personaje.

Demoré poco más de 8 horas en completar el modo historia, aunque podría haber sido un poco menos porque me entretuve con algunos logros. Recomiendo jugarlo por primera vez sin preocuparse en conseguirlos para disfrutar de la experiencia sin distracciones.

Por último cabe agregar que hay un modo multijugador, pero a decir verdad a día de hoy no lo he podido jugar. Si logro hacerlo seguramente actualice la reseña.

[u]Resumen[/u]: [i]Es un juego que hay que jugar[/i]. No es demasiado caro, pero aún así se puede esperar a unas rebajas (como hice yo) para así conseguir los dos juegos (Portal 1 y 2) y tener la experiencia completa.

[u]PD[/u]: [spoiler]Malditos sean Valve y el Gordo Newell por hacer juegos de cartas en vez de sacar Portal 3.[/spoiler]

It's a Valve game.

This is a great sequel to the original that expands greatly upon the original.  Unfortunately, that's both for better and for worse.  There's more of a focus on narrative, and it's really up to individual taste as to whether that's good or bad, but it plays well into the whole adventure.  You get to explore new areas in the testing facility, and learn more about the history of the company, mostly delivered through old recordings that sound like some sunshiney thing from the 1950s.  The writing isn't quite as dark and twisted as the original, but I had quite a few good laughs.  The biggest problems are these areas in between, since it's often difficult to figure out where to go next, and the tests in these areas, which involve different kinds of special gel.  Instead of having the entire puzzle already designed for you, you have to decide where the gel has to go to finish the puzzle yourself before solving it.  To make things worse, these rely heavily on physics, so even with the correct solution, you might wind up dying, anyway, because it just didn't work that time.  That left a bad taste in my mouth, but that was just a portion of the game; the climax and conclusion were good enough to wash it out, and overall, it was a good experience.

Эта игра - не просто головоломка и не просто ходилка. Это что-то особенное, доселе невиданное в игровой вселенной.

Фактически игра представляет из себя череду изолированных друг от друга уровней с заданиями, не выполнив которые, не пойдешь дальше. Собственно, задание каждый раз одно: пройти к выходу. Для выполнения заданий требуется сообразительность и трехмерное мышление. Используя заданный ландшафт и геометрию стен и определенные приспособления для перемещения, подпрыгивания и телепортации, активируя хитроумные механизмы и лазерные лучи - туннели, надо проложить себе дорогу в выходу из уровня. Вам противостоят роботы охранники, коварные ловушки и гравитация.

Voici mon avis sur Portal2 :

Je trouve que c'est un très bon jeu, même avec l'âge du jeu, on a du plaisir à y jouer.
Plusieurs succès et secrets sont cachés, beaucoup de niveau et de chapitre,
Il peut y avoir quelques bugs, mais sa ne gâche pas le jeu. L'histoire est vraiment bien, les voix sont bien.
Les secrets sont sympa à trouver, les easter-eggs et le gameplay est simple mais correcte. L'histoire est bien.


Mon avis sur la Co-op :

La Co-op est meilleur avec un ami, personnellement j'ai terminé la Co-op plusieurs fois, les niveaux sont plus dur que les niveaux du mode Histoire, on doit réfléchir à deux, et agir à deux. La Co-op est longue, mais sympa a faire, toujours quelques bugs ou glitchs présent, notamment un glitch pour passer entièrement un niveau. Mais sa reste très amusant. 

Vous pouvez aussi utiliser la console de commande pour activer la triche, si vous voulez l'utliliser, attendez l'accord de votre partenaire de jeu, et ne soyez pas toxique. (Ouvrez votre console de commande, et marquez : sv cheats 1 OU 0 pour le desactiver.

Bref, je recommande ce jeu de puzzle, avec une bonne histoire, et une fin non déçevante. J'ai déjà fais un speedrun (Vidéo indisponible, déso), j'ai fais 1h53 (Dans mes souvenirs), bon jeu ! ^^

[h1]空間転移を題材にした新感覚アクションパズルゲームの続編[/h1]
Valveの開発したポータルゲートからポータルゲートへ空間転移して進めるアクションパズルゲームの続編。
平穏な日々を送る主人公の元、主人公に葬られたはずのGLaDOSと新しい要素を増したテスト施設の魔の手が迫る。
パズルを淡々と解いていく…という作りではなく、ストーリー仕立ての、具体的には前作のラスボスから延々と恨み節を聞かされながら解く珍しい作り。
前作はギミックが少ない分、瞬発的な動き（ポータルから出たらすぐにポータルを作らなくてはならない等）を要求されたが、今作はギミックが多く、難度の高い閃きを要求される為、分からなければ一気に解こうとせずに気分転換するのも手。

プレイ時間は10時間前後、実績は51、本編のみの進行だけだと15、前作同様の隠し要素のある実績もある。
難易度は高く、前作のプレイ前提の作りになっている為、未プレイなら前作からのプレイをおすすめ。
安価でお手軽、協力プレイもあり、まさにパズルゲームの大衆アイドル的存在。

ya know...honestly i think that portal 2 takes way too much credit. Im not saying it doesnt deserve all the good things i read or hear about it but i think portal 1 deserves WAY more credit and is highly taken for granted...the story was nice, funny, likeable, and the story took a tight turn for the better. 100% play portal 1 first. its short and is just flat out incredible. Now about portal 2...the story was great had a lot of mind blowing turns (especially the one about Chells mother). it was funnier, ALOT longer, and the co op is very high quality. although i wish their were WAY more co op levels the fact that you can build and share chambers mainly fixes that. Also the graphics hold up pretty darn well for a 2011 game. also  DO NOT BE WORRIED about the difficulty. play portal 1 first as it gets you used to how to think and solve these puzzles and is alot easier. i think anyone can figure out these puzzles if they take the needed time. i only had to watch a vid during the part where you are just looking for something rather than doing the puzzle. OVER ALL I BEG YOU TO PLAY THE SERIES IN ORDER AND THEY ARE WORTH THE ASKING PRICE 110%

*Análise atrasada*

[h1]Mais portais? Por favor, sim![/h1]

Portal volta com tudo em sua sequência Portal 2 que nos coloca mais uma vez nos pés da nossa heroína silenciosa, Chell. Mais fases, mais piadinhas sobre como nós podemos morrer de forma agonizante se falharmos em um teste, mais robôs (agora temos uma campanha co-op), mais personagens, mais história e, não podia faltar, nossa IA favorita, GLaDOS!

Na minha última análise sobre o primeiro Portal eu tinha esquecido de comentar sobre como a trilha sonora daquele joga era ótima e mEU AMIGO, a Valve conseguiu se superar ainda mais com Portal 2. Baixe e coloque para tocar no seu casamento com aquela garotinha geek da sua universidade.

Ok, com isso fora do caminho, deixe-me falar da história. Depois dos eventos de Portal 1, Chell acorda de volta em Aperture Science, (só que desta vez bem destruída) e conhece outra IA, Wheatley. O robozinho amigável será responsável por ajudar a Chell em Portal 2 e garantir que ela não morra nas mãos da vil GLaDOS. Wheatley faz um ótimo papel de deuteragonista, sempre fazendo piadas sarcásticas e com um humor que realmente irá te fazer rir às vezes. Após ser resgatada, Chell começa sua fuga do local, mas, junto de seu companheiro, acabam cometendo um erro grave que dificultará sua jornada muito mais.
A jogabilidade não mudou tanto. Agora temos novos jeitos de superar obstáculos, forçando o jogador a ser mais ágil e prestar mais atenção. A arma de portais continua sendo o item principal, acompanhado apenas das Long Fall Boots, botas especiais usadas pelas cobaias de armas de portais para reduzir o impacto de queda, prevenindo assim, danos à arma.
Como mencionado acima, Portal 2 conta com uma campanha em cooperativo em que você e seu amigo assumem o papel de dois robozinhos cobaias que participam de testes com armas de portais. A diferença aqui é que, cada robô tem uma arma de portal com cores diferentes, com os dois complementando o portal do outro. Você e seu amigo vão ter que trabalhar em equipe e pensar bastante para completar os diversos puzzles disponíveis. Ainda tenho que terminar essa campanha em co-op, mas não tenho ninguém com quer jogar. Um dia eu baixo Portal 1 e 2 novamente para conseguir o resto das conquistas.
Os gráficos continuam bonitos, não tendo muitas mudanças. Novamente, não tem nenhum humano para ser renderizado de forma complexa, apenas Chell, mas os detalhes tanto dos robôs quanto dos cenários são belíssimos.

Portal 2 é uma sequência extraordinária em que a Valve que pegou tudo de bom que os jogadores gostaram em Portal 1 e fizeram 10 vezes melhor!

Portal 2 completely revolutionizes everything that the original game accomplished with a new highly engaging story. The mix of comedy and character development have surpassed anything this series has ever seen, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in an experience that is far greater than just puzzle-solving. Linking character interactions and dialogue that is triggered based on where you are looking is a phenomenal design that takes full advantage of player behavior. I was so surprised to see how much bigger environments were, making new concepts like gels and excursion funnels really fun to interact with. There are so many surprises throughout this experience and learning more about GLaDOS definitely expands on more than just her character. On top of this, the cooperative multiplayer mode gives a great deal of replay value, especially when exploring workshop content. If you want to play a masterpiece in storytelling that fits right in with the Half-Life universe, then do it for science...you monster. Game on.

[h1]포탈2는 갓겜입니다 여러분 인생게임 찾았습니다 절.대.포.탈.해[/h1]

전작도 무척 재미있게 플레이해서, 포탈2도 비슷하겠지 싶은 마음으로 시작했는데 기대 이상입니다. 지금까지 접했던 게임 탑3에 꼽을 정도로 훌륭했다고 생각합니다. 포탈 1 하셨던 분들은 후회 없으실 거고, 안 해보신 분들도 꼭 해 보시기를 바라는 게임...!!!

[b]지극히 개인적으로[/b] 생각해 본 장점 및 단점입니다.
[장점]
1) 탄탄한 스토리 
전작보다 훨씬 더 이야기의 내용이 깊어졌습니다. 전작은 무작정 실험실에서 살아남기 느낌이었다면, 이번 게임은 마치 한 편의 서사가 펼쳐지는 느낌? 제가 영화 속 주인공이 되어 이 영화를 이끌어가는 마음이 들더라구요. 그래서 더 몰입감이 들면서 다음 챕터에서는 어떤 상황이 펼쳐질지 알고 싶어 더 열심히 게임을 하게 되는 자신을 발견합니다..! 입체적인 등장인물이 변해가는 모습을 지켜보는 것도 재미있어요.
2) [strike]많은 분들의 뼈가 갈린 듯한[/strike]실제같은 그래픽
그래픽 미쳤습니다. 투박한 부분 없이 섬세하고 진짜 같아요. 1번과 어우러져 몰입감 장난없습니다,, 전작보다 훨씬 예뻐요.
3) 신박한 플레이 방식 추가
전작의 포탈이동 말고도, 다양한 효과를 내는(그리고 적용시키는) 실험 코스들이 있습니다. (자세한 건 플레이하면서 느껴보시길) 내가 생각해서 적용해 봤는데 해냈다? 성취감 미칩니다.
그리고 개인적으로 [b]전작에 비해 [/b] 순발력을 요하는 코스가 줄어서 좋더라구요. 순발력보다는 창의력이나 사고력이 중요시되는 코스들이 많아서 운동신경 둔한 저로서는 너무 행복했습니다. 그래서 그런지 난이도도 전보다 좀더 낮은 느낌이었어요.
4) 구석구석 재미난 포인트!!!
사실 이 점이 제일 좋았습니다. 개인적으로 시니컬한 풍자나 블랙유머류를 좋아하는데 포탈 2 하면서 쉴새없이 웃었네요. 등장인물 하나하나마다 너무 귀엽고 개성이 뚜렷합니다. 또 도전과제도 전보다 재미있어서 하나하나 모으는 것도 꽤 쏠쏠해요. 돌아다니면서 회사 홍보 포스터나 광고 보는 것도 재미집니다.
5) 친구와 함께 플레이
둘이서 할 수 있는 모드가 나왔더라구요!? 아쉽게도 저는 [strike]친구가 없어서[/strike] 해 보지는 못했지만, 실제로 협동모드 도전과제 중에서 재밌어 보이는 게 진짜 많더라구요. 친구 있는 분들은 꼭 같이 해보시길....

[단점]
1) 공간이동 게임 특성상의 어지러움
아무래도 3D멀미 있으신 분들은 어지러울 수 있기에, 쉬면서 하시는 걸 추천드려요. 그래도 전작보다 많이 개선되었다는 느낌을 받았고, 저는 괜찮았습니다.
2) 머리쓰는 게임 특성상의 화남(feat.샷건)
잘 안 풀리면 화나는 건 어쩔 수 없죠... 그래도 자신을 믿고 [strike]혹은 유튜브의 공략을 믿고[/strike]해봅시다! 사실 그렇게 어려운 문제도 거의 없어요.

포탈 2 진짜 후회 없습니다. 저는 세일할 때 아무것도 모르고 샀었는데, 하고 나니까 정가 주고도 살 만 하겠더라구요. 플레이타임도 길고 스토리도 재밌고 글라도스도 귀엽고...
[h2]케이크도 맛있지만 감자는 더 맛있습니다[/h2]

Amazing puzzle game

[h1]엔딩의 여운이 아직까지도 가시지 않는 게임[/h1]

*스포 배제

1. 전작 Portal 1과 비교하여.

-포탈 1은 짧고 강렬했다. 포탈건을 이용해 공간을 이동하고, 그 매커니즘을 통해 퍼즐을 풀어나가는 기믹은 신선하고 흥미로웠다.
포탈 2는 그냥 강렬해졌다. 거대하고, 강렬한, 잊을 수 없는 느낌. Portal 2 가 2011년작이라는 것이 믿기지가 않을 정도이다.

2. 난이도.

-포탈 1은 쉬운 감이 없잖아 있었다. 하지만 1에서는 포탈건이라는 개념 자체가 생소한 부분도 있었기 때문에, 이 개념을 처음 접하는 사람에게 있어 포탈 1의 레벨 디자인은 안성맞춤이다. 포탈 2는 포탈 1의 후속작인 만큼, 포탈건과 포탈의 개념에 적응한 사람들이 많았다. 그걸 의식해서인지 포탈 2의 난이도는 1보다 조금 더 높아졌다. 그렇지만 이번에도 클리어하기 어려운 수준은 아니었다. 밸브의 레벨 디자인이 돋보이는 부분이다. 처음에는 뭐가 뭔지 모르겠다가도, 부딪히고, 실험해보고, 시도해보면 어느새 정답에 도달해 있다. 이것저것 해보다가 깨달음을 얻듯 찾아오는 정답들은, 문제 하나하나를 해결할 때마다 카타르시스를 가져다 준다. 포탈의 난이도는 걱정할 필요 없다. 네가 정말 바보가 아니라면, 여러가지를 시도하다보면 정답에 향하게 된다. 걱정 말고 부딪혀라. 내가 헤맸던 부분은 퍼즐이 아닌 문 틈 사이로 났던 길 뿐이었다. 

3. 엔딩

-엔딩 자체는 매우 깔끔하다. 3이 나올 여지는 없다. 엔딩을 말하자면 스포니 그때 들었던 감정만 열거하자면, 당혹스러웠으나 행복했고, 뿌듯했으나 아쉬웠으며, 증오했으나 동정했다.
2019년에 엔딩을 보았으나, 1년이란 시간이 지난 지금에도 엔딩의 느낌은 잊을 수 없다.

4. 멀티플레이

-멀티플레이와 싱글 플레이는 시간대가 다르다. 싱글플레이 이후의 시간대가 멀티플레이 부분이니, 멀티플레이를 하기 전 싱글 플레이를 하는 것을 먼저 추천한다. 멀티플레이도 굉장히 방대하고 재미있다. 그러나 친구와 같이 할 땐 비슷한 문제 해결력을 지닌 친구들과 플레이하길 바란다. 심하면 싸우는 경우가 생길 수도 있다.

While this game may be [b] 9 years old [/b] ,it still rivals with Singleplayer games today and after you play it, you will probably never forget the experience. Although I recommend playing the first [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/400/Portal/] Portal [/url] game first to sort of understand what's going on, it's really up to you because the game already manages a good job of explaining the story by it's unique dialog and events. While this game is mostly made of puzzles usually accompanied with some brief story related dialog, it sometimes has moments totally different to what was happening just a few seconds ago. Those moments are the [b] REAL [/b] part of the game usually revealing most of the stuff going on. [spoiler] While the start of the game really explains the story and kinda tells you what's your goal, it slowly changes to more harder puzzles and at the end, the puzzles start being easier so the player can complete them quicklier to give him a feel of urgency [/spoiler]. [b] The Characters [/b], [b] Dialog [/b] they say, [b] Soundtrack [/b] and [b] Solid Gameplay [/b] together make a great game and that is Portal 2. Now, I also want to talk about Co-op mode since it's a big part of the game and it even being hinted in the main Campaign too. So, the Co-op mode is supposed to be played with a friend [i] (obviously) [/i] and he doesn't even have to understand the basics of Portal, since the levels are designed to teach the newer one's but moving up in difficulty over time so it's not just completely simple levels all the time. This mode is very fun and I recommend everyone to play it. While there is a feature to find you a Co-op partner that's also looking to play, communication is very much needed. Yes, there is a way to talk to your Co-op partner in-game, but if you live in a continent with a lot of different languages like Europe, it's pretty hard to find a parter that speaks english. So you'll be better with just playing with a good friend that is patient enough. You can also create your own levels or download custom Singleplayer or Co-op levels from the workshop if you're tired of playing the same all the time. Anyways, I very much recommend this game and I hope this helps someone decide if they really want to buy this game.

Voy a ser directo:
Comparado con el Portal 1 La diferencia es abismal en básicamente todos los aspectos del juego.

Mientras en el Portal 1 solo avanzabamos por camaras de pruebas iguales, en este juego vamos a pasar por los restos de esas mismas camaras,las antiguas instalaciones de Aperture Science (Con algunas referencias a Black Mesa) y las nuevas camaras de pruebas.

Con la historia no tengo quejas,tiene personajes muy bien desarrollados y una trama interesante que no decepciona.

Si comparamos el tiempo de duracion hay una diferencia de 3 horas (Portal 1) y unas 10 horas (Portal 2) en la campaña de un jugador al menos ese fue mi tiempo.

Multijugador: Seguramente lo mas innovador de esta segunda entrega,Si vos y tu compañero saben las basicas de los portales dura facil unas 5 horas.
Esto nos lleva a que si no tenes amigos para jugar tenes que esperar unos lindos 10 minutos o rara vez te empareja
instantaneamente,Se podria decir que esta muerto,pero eso no es culpa de el juego.

Entre otras cosas nuevas estan los tres tipos de geles que juntados con los portales son un buen aire fresco a la jugabilidad
Lo mismo con el editor de niveles tanto cooperativo como para un jugador que da oportunidades infinitas

En Conclusion si tenes la oportunidad no te podes perder esta joya

But seriously play this game if you haven't. Portal 2 does everything the original game did and made them even better. Everything from the mechanics, puzzles, and characters have been revamped and makes the first game look like a tech demo. The story that you experience is engaging and immersive and adds on to the original story concepts of Portal. The whimsical and sometimes dark humor is still present in this game. Plus, both Portal games are ridiculously cheap in comparison to other titles (both indie and triple A) out there during sales. So get the bundle and treat yourself to eight hours of perplexing puzzling fun.

[h1]Всем привет![/h1]
[b]Это моё НЕ СУБЪЕКТИВНОЕ МНЕНИЕ, так, что не ждите адекватной оценке в конце. [/b]


[h1]ПРЕДЫСТОРИЯ[/h1]

[b]В 2007 году компания Valve сделала замечательную игру Portal.И через 3 года выходит сиквел данной игры.Portal 2 это — игра в жанре головаломка.Главной героине предстоит проходить испытания в разных по величене камерах.Ей поможет в этом деле знаменитая портальная пушка.[/b]

[h1] ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ [/h1]

[b]При помощи этой пушки героиня за которую мы играем — Чел, может создавать два портала(синего и оранжевого цвета).Через эти порталы она может пойти в недоступные для обычного человека места.Комнаты, где идут эксперементы не однообразны и чтобы пройти уровень нужно много думать.Игра состоит из 9 эпизодов, каждая проходится где-то за 40-60 минут.[/b]

[h1]СЮЖЕТ [/h1]

[b]У игры очень хорошая и приятная концовка.Кроме Чел, в игре немало персонажей.Друг, но в конце игры главный враг — робот Уитли.Главный враг первой Portal — Гледос и говорящий картофель.Лично я прошель с удовольствием эту игру 2 раза.[/b]

[h1]ПРОЧЕЕ [/h1]

[b] В игре полно вещей препятствующие нам в прохождении игры(в хорошем смысле) — лазеры, панели, кнопки куда надо вставить кубы.Есть 2 вида кубов.Первый просто куб, а второй пропускает лазер в нужном направлении.Ещё есть куб соединенный с турелью.Коротко о турелях — они стреляют пулями, от которого Чел. умирает.[/b]

[h1]ИТОГИ [/h1]

[i]Игра мне очень понравилась. Советую купить эту замечательную игру. 10/10[/i]

I'm not a big fan of puzzle games or platformers but this one is definitely an exception.

Portal 2 is a unique classic in that It's easily accessible, incredibly fun, well-written, well-paced, and challenging. The puzzles really force to think creatively, the story is memorable and darkly humorous without becoming annoying or over-the-top edgy, graphics stand up well to this day despite running on the ancient Source Engine, and the soundtrack blends in incredibly well with your actions in the game.

There's little reason for anyone to not play this game.

The story is short, it can be finished in six to ten hours, the controls are simple and easy enough for your grandma to learn and master even if she's never played a video game before, the game is rated E, so there's no swearing, no blood, and the most violent thing in the game are the turrets, and even those are pretty endearing, so even the most religious and conservative parents have little reason to not let their kids (or even themselves) play. The game is dirt cheap and it gets only cheaper on sale, additionally, it's also included in many of the Valve game bundles (which are worth checking out as well if you're interested in "essential video game experiences") so price isn't much of a barrier either.

Just do yourself a favor and play Portal 2, you won't regret it, and even if you do, you would only have lost some pocket change and a few hours of your life.

This is just going to sum up my great xp with a friend of mine. We played the standard chambers, one by one. Had some struggles, but the bonding with your partner is immeasurable, because you both go through the same stuff. We're looking forward to play challenge mode next. Big yikes, given the last standard chamber took us almost six hours. Still, I recommend this game for wholesomeness it presents just by playing multiplayer.

If you have not yet Purchased this game, you are missing out, and I mean really missing out. Go through Portal 1 then this one.

I love this game, I love Portal 1 & 2. They are both such heartwarming story games, they may not be a FPS, but they are amazing story games back at the time when they've been released.

The story continues where you've left off at Portal (you don't say) but it was not what I expected at all, it's far beyond my expectations, it's really well written, it plays with your emotions as you are going through it, and the ending.. Don't get me started I don't wanna spoil it for ya. I loved going through the game, so much.

The Level design is really good, I loved looking at how destroyed the place is, makes you question what happened to this place. Also, Aperture is really, really really huge. I knew it was big, but it's waaaay bigger than I expected when I was going through it.

The soundtrack.. Love it. It's really good to just relax to, and some parts of the soundtrack just really make you want to move as quick as possible, some parts of it make you question what happened to this place. Overall, it is a well made Soundtrack.

The puzzles were.. Not very easy, and not very hard, on some parts I had to look up how to solve them, some other parts were as easy as pie or were like a walk in the park. And some really made me scratch my head just so I can face palm when I finally figure it out for being so stupid sometimes.. We all are a bit stupid sometimes, don't forget that.

The events of this game were well scripted, they work flawlessly, and they have, and will always surprise me every time.

In short: 10/10. Go get it!

I won't lie, at first I wasn't really into the game. I felt that at first the concept of portal testing has gotten old at this point and the simplicity and shortness of the first game was what's so good about it. I also wasn't a huge fan of Wheatley. But, over time, the game got massively better. Either that or I grew accustomed to it.

Either way, in the end I realized Portal 2 is an absolutely worthy successor. Every bit as clever, entertaining, and well-made as the original with some more puzzles that are even more fun! Blue jumpy slime! Fast orange slime! Semen-colored portal slime!! There's also more story and world-building in this game as we get to have an idea of what Aperture was like, specifically in the moments where you're underground. Very very good. I love these games.

h

This game saved my life.

I am 27.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Smart, funny, creative and an over all great experience that expands on the original Portal game while staying true to all the things that made the first game so good. While maintaining the mechanics of the previous game, they also add to the mechanics with new surface types which expands on the use of physics in the problem solving context of the game. Story and humour are better than ever and coop is great. Truly a wonderful game, and might just be my favourite game of all time. Not sure if they will ever make a Portal 3, but I can dream right? :)

Never had a game change my life like Portal 2 did. I'm not a very serious gamer, but the things I've learned through going through this game were genuine life lessons. Creative problem-solving is useful in any situation, but the idea behind problem solving via portals is different. It challenges you to allow yourself to adapt to different situations and work with the resources you have access to, while also keeping you on your toes to be capable of functioning in changing environments. On top of that (I'll be general here to avoid spoilers), it's taught me a great deal about working with people you disagree with, as well as how to react when people you trust do things that you disagree with. In tandem, this game is a brilliantly crafted, mind-bogglingly beautiful challenge of mind and comprehension, as well as having some elements that provoke social skills and force you to deal with awkward situations

[h1]新一代起源引擎打造的2代传送门创造了与1不同的世界[/h1]

总而言之就是剧情比1代长的多，地图也大到离谱，很难想象是2011年的游戏，除了建模看上去晕之外，其他都是v社一贯的风格。
2代的女主重回地下，复活g姐，没想到最后居然一起联手了。最后g姐也是放走了女主，故事到这里就结束了，大概率是不会出3了。

[b]故事建立在半条命的世界观，应该是在黑山基地和光圈科技的战争背景下的故事。
多人联机也是有剧情，不过代入感真心不强。。主要还是和朋友联机互坑有意思。所以差不多把单人通关就卸载了。[/b]

本作相对其他游戏烧脑，[u]想无脑突突突爽的就别来了。获取快乐的增益曲线与其他游戏非常不同，[/u]喜欢的人玩上千小时都有可能，不喜欢的就像我单人通关就可卸载。

Portal 2 is not just a videogame, but a lesson in game design.

The game picks up the somewhat lost tradition of groundbreaking games developed by Valve, walking in the footsteps of milestones such as Half Life 2, and to this day remains one of the absolute best games I ever had the pleasure to experience.

Portal 2 should be played and revered by every person considering a career in game design as it represents a superbly balanced mix of all the components that make a gaming experience great.

Exploration, Humour, Set-Pieces, Narration, Atmosphere, Difficulty; all these aspects are balanced with a care and love that only legendary developers such as Valve have, as a results we get a game that never gets dull, repeats itself or stumbles the player with overly difficult puzzles (which are still available in the many additional bonus maps).

One of the finest pieces of digital entertainment ever conceived, and one of the few games that managed to transcend the notion of videogame, permeating into the general pop culture and achieving the status of legend.

More than recommended; almost mandatory.

The first portal is a perfect game, but Portal 2 somehow manages to be better in every way. Everything is cranked up to 11. There is deeper gameplay with more puzzle elements, the music is better, there are most characters with more story, the atmosphere is so fucking amazing it makes me want a game where you just explore the lab either in it's hay-day or just more of what was in portal 2. I guess I should break down every element and how amazing it is.
First, the gameplay. Compared to the original, there are oodles more elements to play with. There are the laser blocks, light bridges, goo, fling things and much more. These allow for some genius puzzles that are extremely satisfying to solve. Plus the physics are much better and helps iron out some of the kinks when going through portals like the original game.
I guess on to the story cause holy shit is it good. I won't spoil it but there are so many twists and turns and damn are all the characters so lovable. Everything in this world has it's own personality and none of them overstay there welcome. While the first game had a lot of under-story that built up till the end, this game is constant with an amazing narrative that keeps you wanting more. Plus the humor is fucking amazing. Please, look around the world because the signs and things scattered around are the best parts of this game.
The one thing that interests me more than the story is the atmosphere. You still get that sense of loneliness that the original game had but with a little more life. This is entering spoiler territory so be warned. The highlight of this of course is the old abandoned aperture labs. Everything is like a dusty time capsule that I can't really describe. Guess you just have to play it. The music complements this atmosphere perfectly. There isn't too much to say about it other than it is a bummer that the best song from Portal 1 (the radio song) barely shows up.
Well I guess that wraps it up. Portal 2 is perfected perfection, and if you haven't played it, what are you waiting for?

Portal 2 é um jogo de puzzle divertido e engraçado. O enredo, os personagens, a comédia estão muito bem feitos. Esse jogo é antigo, mas tem gráficos incríveis e ele roda até em placa de vídeo da intel, então não se preocupe. A campanha principal do jogo vai te dar bastante horas de jogo se tu for burro que nem eu, e ainda tem o modo de dois jogadores, aliás, recomendo jogar com um amigo, pois poucas pessoas jogam o online e não é tão divertido se você não tem um amigo. Também tem outras fases criadas pela comunidade que são muito divertidas e desafiadoras. Eu já joguei esse jogo a um tempo atrás no meu PS3 e esperei uma promoção pra comprar no PC, se você não tiver jogado esse jogo antes ele 100% vale os 20 reais. Pode comprar sem medo, não é atoa que esse jogo tem análises extremamente positivas :)

НУ что-ж игра Portal 2 одна из первых игр которые я проходил(то-есть не шутеры в которые я обычно играю, а сюжетные игры) ииииииии...... эта игра мне безумно понравилась. Единственный минус который я обнаружил проходя эту игру это то, что в начале всё кажется скучным и из-за этого эта игра отпугивает новичков, НО стоит углубиться в игру понять сюжет вообще понять что происходит ты будешь довольно много задротить в неё, по крайней мере это было со мной так. Игра хорошая за свою цену, сюжет глубокий и прикольный, графика особая не нужна любая микроволновка потянет. Вот и конец моего отзыва по этой игре. WoW! Jestem bardzo pozytywnie zaskoczony tą grą, myślałem że będzie beznadziejna z bezsensowną kampanią. Jakże się myliłem! Kampania bardzo staranna a na końcu wzruszająca i dająca wiele do myślenia, wręcz zmieniająca poglądy na świat rzeczywisty. Jest to gra pobudzająca (bardzo bardzo) myślenie nieszablonowe i kreatywność - której tu nie mało! Gra idealna na prezent dla dziecka, tak! Nie ma tu przemocy/krwi itp. jesteś ty i kreatywność, sam na sam. Kto wygra? Ale wracając, idealna dla chłopców i dziewczynek, - a dla dziewczyn gier wielu nie ma. Posiada też tryb kooperacji gdzie ze znajomymi można się połączyć i razem rozwiązywać jakże te ekscytujące zagadki. Gra jest stara co jest plusem ponieważ można grać na starym sprzęcie w średnio i stabilnych 300 FPS (Ja mam Geforce GTX 750 i mam średnio 420 FPS).

This is a good improvement overall. The single-player is really fun for a puzzle game and I will admit some of the puzzles actually did kind of stump me. It does also have a couple environments outside of just the testing chambers like the abandoned test chambers. The introduction of Blue, Red, and White gel are also an interesting concept for puzzles as well. Although it does have my main problem for most puzzle games and that is that in can be pretty short but still it is a fun experience. The Co-Op mode is also a bit short but it is still just a fun mode to do with friends but I don't find it necessary to add cosmetics to buy in co-op mode I don't think I really want to customize Atlas or P-Body and you have to pay actual money for most of the cosmetics, but I was still fine with it overall I can understand if people bought the cosmetics. Also I got to say this game doesn't really offer a lot of replay value all I can really name is just messing around on the community chambers and that's about it. This is a worthy follow up to the original coming from a Portal fan. So I give this a 8/10

Going into Portal 2 I knew I was going to like it because of the game play because it's just so cool. But I didn't expect to laugh as much as I did, like the writing is very witty and clever, and on top of that the designs of everything looks really cool, and the voice actors amazing, especially Glados's voice actor and it also has JK Simmons in it so I mean :flushed: , but there is also something so nostalgic about it I can't explain especially with visuals and some of the story, even tho I've never seen this game before. And also the world building through dialogue and scenery is actually mind blowing. Like at the end of the game when you're on the moon and also when you're in the field it makes me so nostalgic, and I don't know how to explain it but it reminds of my doctors posters in his office when I was young of like the sky and shit. Also the soundtrack is fire, it is one of the greatest games I've ever played. A step up from Portal 1 in every way, I hope one day I can find a game that matches what this game is starting to mean to me.

Honestly one of the greatest game experiences I have ever had.

The graphics and story are both amazing, a huge highlight is also the amazing soundtrack that gives this nostalgia-ery otherworldly feeling to it. Especially when it ramps up during flight/freefall. The voice acting is amazing and Wheatley and GLaDOS have loads of character and personality unlike GLaDOS from the first game.

The best bit to me is old aperture, you get this amazing feeling going back in time and seeing the barely touched past and seeing remnants of the 50's-80's of aperture, being all the way down there and hearing the whole facility crack and creak around you is so breathtaking, and you just want to know how big this place is, the sense of scale and wonder about the thousands of untouched corridors and secrets in this game is amazing, still looks good in 2020. 1 was an idea, 2 was the game.

10/10 must play, I don't even like puzzle games :)

[h1] Overview [/h1]
Portal 2 is an absolutely great game. I personally think that the original Portal is harder in difficulty than Portal 2, but the story is much more developed than the side game of the Orange Box that was Portal. Besides the story, Portal 2 has some new mechanics such as the Laser Redirection Box and especially the gels. Portal 2 is absolutely a great successor to what is one of the greatest games ever.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
The gameplay of Portal 2 is very much similar to Portal in gameplay. It takes place after Portal in the now decayed facility. The beginning of the game has new puzzles similar to the first game, but the great bit of the game for me is later when the introduce the gels. I loved the gels later in the game and I also loved the new old looking test chambers down in the bottom of the testing facility. The main game is great, however I also loved the coop mode. I haven't it much because I don't really have many people to play with. However its a pleasant addition to the game, but another great addition to the game is workshop support. Many people have made maps and I've even made some maps myself. Its a feature that this game absolutely needed as more and more levels are available from the community and they can make extremely difficult maps.

[h1] Soundtrack and Visuals [/h1]
The visuals of the game look a bit more sharper than the first game, however I really loved the decayed setting of the facility. Especially when down in the abandoned test chambers I loved the gel testing chambers along with the older chamber designs. The soundtrack as well is great for the game. It fits perfectly into the game and improves the immersive experience of the game.

[h1] Conclusion [/h1]
I would absolutely recommend this legendary game. It is one of the greatest games ever made and I think is the greatest puzzle game ever made. I love playing workshop maps that people make as well as the main game. The coop mode is something I don't do much but is also nice. This absolutely deserves a recommendation.

If you like Portal 1, you'll love Portal 2. It takes all of the good things about its predecessor, from its puzzles to its writing, and makes them even better. Plus, the addition of it's co-op campaign and the fact that you can upload custom maps directly to Steam are great. However, the greatest change from 1 to 2 is how much longer it is. On top of the full fledged co-op, the singleplayer took me over 30 hours to complete, compared to my 2 runs of the first game adding up to less than 5.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
Portal 2 is a Singleplayer/Co-op puzzle game created by Valve and released in 2011, but as with many Valve games they are still great nearly a decade later. The controls are snappy, the characters are expressive and well acted, the story is well written and the graphics are still somewhat up to date. Portal 2 was a revolutionary title when it came out, Valve once again setting the standards for videogames. 
[h2]Cons[/h2]
Portal 2 is a puzzle game, which may not be everyone's cup of tea. Personally, I loved this game without being a puzzle game fan, the characters and writing were compelling and interesting.
[h3]Conclusion[/h3]
Portal 2 isn't for everyone, but it was certainly for me and many other friends. It has good replayability and really made me laugh at parts with its clever writing. 8/10

Одна из лучших игр-головоломок (да и вообще игр) в принципе! Ещё с детства мне понравилась первая часть серии, которая проходилась всего за час-полтора. Здесь же.. Здесь всё отполировано фактически до ИДЕАЛА : графика, и по сей день радующая глаз (игре более 8 лет), интересный сюжет, харизматичные и запоминающиеся герои, сбалансированные квесты, невероятно увлекательный кооператив - всё это здесь, в Portal 2! В наши дни таких легендарных игр выходит достаточно мало, но Valve просто заставили меня боготворить эту игру! Твёрдая 10!

A great sequel to the excellent first game, having expanded both in scale and mechanical depth. Suffers from the slight drawback of not being as tight and concise as the first game, and demonstrates that the temptation of spectacle is something not even a developer as shrewd as Valve could resist. It is however still leagues ahead of your typical AAA guff, and when taken as a whole, is a masterpiece in its own right. Bonus point for having an ending that actually gives some closure instead of finishing on a cliffhanger which goes unresolved for years. Play it, savour it, and replay it every few months to remind yourself there's still things to look forward to in life.

提个小细节
游戏刚开始你会在垃圾管道里看到一个给你打招呼的Turret
她对你说了一句“I’m different.”
很开心，我在后面的粉碎机传送带又碰到了她
在救了她之后，她会说“Thank you.”
然后她语音的下一句话是
“普罗米修斯为了把知识送给人类，而受到了上帝的惩罚，他被投入深沟，任鸟儿啄食。”
喔......
我想一直带着她，可万恶的G胖在下一个拐角就放了一道凋亡门
她消失的那一刻，我确实有点小难受

In making the sequel to Portal, Valve managed to take everything incredible about the previous masterpiece and improve on it. The white test room boxes of the original looked fine, but they became mundane after several hours of gameplay. This game maintains the test rooms, but adds additional impressive environments to gaze at while solving puzzles. The original game excelled at character, and Portal 2 continues this with the addition of more wonderful characters that are always a pleasure to listen to. While Portal 1 excelled at character, it lacked a traditional story to place the characters into outside of a very basic setup and conclusion. Portal 2 adds a brilliant story, treading the player along with constant hints and mystery while they explore more of what Aperature Science was like during its peak. More Portal puzzles are always a good thing, and the additional mechanics are implemented extremely well. Everyone with a computer capable of running this game should play it.

ЧТО БЫЛО ПРИ КЕЙВЕ ДЖОНСОНЕ. ЧТО МЫ ПОТЕРЯЛИ

1. ПРЕОБРАЗУЮЩИЙ ГЕЛЬ ДЕЛАЛИ ИЗ ЛУННЫХ КАМНЕЙ. МОЖНО БЫЛО ЛЮДЕЙ ТРАВИТЬ.

2. СИЛА ГРАВИТАЦИИ БЫЛА СЛАБЕЕ ПРОЦЕНТОВ НА 80. ТЕСТОВЫЕ СУБЬЕКТЫ КАМЕРЫ ПРОХОДИЛИ С РАЗБЕГУ.

3. ЛАБОРАНТ РАБОТАЛ В СРЕДНЕМ ПЯТЬ МИНУТ. БОЛЕЗНЕЙ НЕ СУЩЕСТВОВАЛО КРОМЕ УВОЛЬНЕНИЙ.

4. ЕСЛИ В ТЕСТОВОЙ КАМЕРЕ СПОТКНЕШЬСЯ И УПАДЕШЬ - ЛАБОРАНТЫ ПОДБЕГАЛИ, 20 БАКСОВ В КАРМАНЫ ЗАСОВЫВАЛИ, РАЗБИРАЛИ ТЕЛО НА ОРГАНЫ, ПРЕДЛАГАЛИ ЕЩЁ 20 БАКСОВ, ОПУХОЛИ ВЫЛЕЧИТЬ.

5. ТЕСТОВЫЕ СУБЬЕКТЫ СРАЗУ В ТЕСТОВЫЕ СФЕРЫ ЗАЛЕТАЛИ.

К ВОДЕ СТРАШНО ПОДОЙТИ БЫЛО: ЛЮДЕЙ РАСТВОРЯЕТ.

6. ГЛАДОС РАССКАЗЫВАЛА: ЛЮДИ УТРОМ НЕ ПРОСЫПАЛИСЬ ОТ НЕЙРОТОКСИНА.

7. СРОК БЕРЕМЕННОСТИ СОСТАВЛЯЛ 4.5 МЕСЯЦА. ДЕТИ РОЖДАЛИСЬ ПО 120-150 КИЛОГРАММ С БЕЛОКУРЫМИ ВОЛОСАМИ И ЯСНЫМИ ГОЛУБЫМИ ГЛАЗАМИ И ВОЛЕВЫМИ УМНЫМИ ЛИЦАМИ - СРАЗУ НА ТЕСТЫ ПРОСИЛИСЬ.

В Portal 2 вы откроете для себя инновационный геймплей, сюжет и музыку, которая помогла оригиналу заработать более 70 наград в игровой индустрии, а также создала целый культ имени самой себя.

На блюде с одиночной игрой Portal 2 вы сможете поживиться несколькими новыми персонажами, разнообразными неожиданными головоломками и еще большим количеством тестовых комнат. Игроки смогут познакомиться с неизвестными им частями лаборатории Aperture Science и снова объединятся с ГЛаДОС — порою издевательски злобной компьютером-компаньоншей, которая помогала главному герою пройти все испытания в первой части игры.

Играя в кооперативном режиме, игроки откроют для себя абсолютно новую, независимую от оригинальной сюжетную линию с новыми тестовыми комнатами и двумя персонажами. Здесь каждому из вас придется проявить все то, что вы знаете о порталах. Чтобы добиться успеха, вы будете обязаны не просто играть вместе, но и думать сообща.

Особенности игры
Протяженная кампания для одиночной игры: захватывающий сюжет и передовой геймплей заставят вас не отрываться от экрана на протяжении нескольких часов.
Полноценный кооперативный режим на двух человек: многопользовательская игра со своей сюжетной линией, персонажами и геймплеем.
Улучшенная физика: всё становится еще интереснее, необычнее и запутаннее, но никак не сложнее!
Оригинальная музыка.
Громадный сиквел: первый Portal получил звание «Игра 2007 года» от более чем 30 ведущих игровых изданий.
Инструменты для редактирования: в Portal 2 включены инструменты для разработчиков.

O que posso dizer de Portal 2... Portal 2 é um jogo  de puzzle em primeira pessoa desenvolvido e publicado pela Valve. Lançado em 2011, portal 2 já recebia uma grande legião de fãs que se acomodavam desde o primeiro game, e tenho certeza de que essa continuação não deixa a desejar. Com toda certeza é um dos jogos mais marcantes já produzidos. De fato acredito que Portal seja uma franquia que não é para todos, mas aqueles que obtiveram contato, após terminarem o game, nunca mais foram os mesmos. Eu demorei umas 18 horas para zerar o jogo, sendo que passei um bom tempo jogando o modo multiplayer, que diga-se de passagem é maravilhoso... Mas o foco neste análise será a campanha principal. 

    Uma das coisas que mais me deixaram intrigados com o game foi a "ausência" de trilha sonora (não é que não tenha, mas boa parte do jogo a única coisa que você vai escutar é o silêncio), mas acaba que isso não se torna uma pedra no caminho já que em conjunto você tem a ambientação do game, que por si só já é um motivo para entender o porquê do mesmo não ter trilha sonora. A ambientação de Portal é algo rico e único que chega a ser indescritível, pois palavras não são o suficiente para demonstrar o quão é o nível reflexivo que o jogador fica. Em vários momentos da jogatina eu fiquei parado no game por horas apenas admirando e tentando imaginar o por que daquilo tudo, da paisagem e como tudo acabou daquela maneira, ou como era antes do desparecimento dos humanos. Minha imaginação fluía como as águas de uma cachoeira sem fim imaginando e refletindo sobre várias coisas, o sentimento de vazio e infinitas possibilidades de situações que minha imaginação criava e me deixava zureta. Novamente, eu poderia ficar o dia todo comentando sobre a ambientação e os cenários do game sem me cansar, ou então repetindo as mesmas coisas com afinco. Uma coisa é certa, só quem jogou o game até o fim e parou mesmo que um pouco para dar atenção aos cenários, consegue entender exatamente o que eu estou pensando ê, sentindo em relação a esse aspecto do game. As músicas, mesmo que poucas, mas sim, presentes no game, são maravilhosas. A história muito bem desenvolvida, e com um plot de cair o queixo, e com um final e virada de abrir mais ainda a sua boca com uma solução muito esperta e incrível, mesmo que um pouco viajada.  Não posso afirmar que o jogo é livre de defeitos, mas uma coisa é certa, um bom apreciador, ao jogar portal, não vai achar defeitos no game na primeira vez, isso é certo. O gosto por ele vai ser tão grande que vai soar como a perfeição, e de fato na minha humilde opinião ele é. Pode não ser, e de fato não é o melhor jogo do mundo, ma talvez seja um dos melhores facilmente, e para minha humilde pessoa, é um dos melhores jogos da qual eu joguei dentre a minha vida comum e mortal.

Portal 2 offers a variety of levels on which we will have to use our creativity (more or less) in order to complete the levels, even tho there's only one way to complete all the levels.

After spending 2 hours into the game, I felt bored throughout the rest, since it goes with the same pattern, solve the puzzle, go to the next one, solve the puzzzle, go to the next one, on and on.

The story itself goes more deeeper than the game actually tells you, it goes along with you with a lot of dialogues coming out of the companions you meet along the way, but don't expect them to tell you what exactly happened, take all of the information and make a conclution yourself.

I recommend this game to all new players and experienced players who haven't tried it yet, it's a classic I would say everyone must go through, try not to miss it!

Значительно легче в плане испытаний, более захватывающе и дольше в плане сюжета чем предыдущая часть. Появление новых инструментов для испытаний (таких как прыгучая жидкость и жидкость для ускорения) дали интерес и легкость при их выполнении, но к сожалению с ними можно поиграть только с середины игры. Сюжет стал более развит ибо в прошлой части мы просто видели сюжет: Беги сука! Беги! В этой же у нас целая драма и сюжет становится похож на целый сценарий фильма, а не просто ща побегу убью и конец. Еще у нас появляется в напарниках разговорчивый робот что дает игре атмосферу и небольшой юмор. Стало меньше испытаний и больше "свободной" игры.

Это однозначно шедевр! Я являюсь ярым фанатом этой игры. И считаю, что каждый должен в нее поиграть. (А вообще, существуют ли еще люди, которые не играли в эту игру?) Просто обожаю раз в пол года поиграть в нее. Сюжет, головоломки, графика (для 2011-то!), музыка - в этой игре идеально все! (Музыку я изредка прослушиваю отдельно)
Но для кого-то она может показаться скучной: среди моих немногочисленных друзей нет ни одного, кому эта игра понравилась *плак-плак*  Как сказал мой давний друг - "просто бродить от одной головоломки к другой, выслушивая скучную болтовню модуля мне не в кайф". Именно из-за этого я не могу оценить мультиплеерную часть этой игры - мне просто не с кем в нее поиграть.

前作をプレイしている人には間違いなくオススメできる作品。
前作プレイしてない人は、まず前作のPotalをプレイしよう。
ここからはレビュー。
まず、前作のパズル要素に新しいアイテムたちが加わりさらに面白くなっている。
さらに前作顔負けの仕上げられた完璧なストーリー。
クリアした後には達成感と満足感しかない。
前作同様やりこみ要素もあるぞ！
ボリュームとしては前作を超え、ストーリー、パズル要素もボリュームアップしている。
これは私個人の感覚としてなのだが、前作より3D酔いもしなくなっている気がする。
とにかくオススメ。
